Title: FullBowody
Subtitle: Track your body in real-time with simple cameras!
PlaceCameras: Place your cameras in the room
PlaceCamerasDesc:
Whether it's a smartphone, webcam, or surveillance camera, FullBowody can use any camera to track your body in real-time.
Just frame the camera on a reference marker and FullBowody takes care of the rest.
PlaceMarkersDesc:
Select the reference marker of your choice and place it in the room where the camera can see it.
FullBowody will find the marker and position your body accordingly for even more precise tracking.
StartTrackingDesc:
Everything is ready! All you have to do is start tracking and connect third-party applications to enjoy this instant tracking.
Whether it's for games, fitness or health apps, augmented or virtual reality, FullBowody is ready to follow you everywhere!
